sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react";
import MovieInformation from "../../Dialogs/MovieInformation"
import yoda from "../../../Assets/yoda.jpg"
import {
  Card,
  CardContent,
  Grid,
  Typography,
  IconButton,
  Tooltip,
  Chip,
  CardMedia,
  ButtonBase
} from "@material-ui/core";

export default function Start(props) {

  const [openMovieInformation, setOpenMovieInformation] = useState(false);

  return (
    <>
      <ButtonBase onClick={() => setOpenMovieInformation(true)} >
        <Card>
          <CardActionArea>
            <CardMedia
              component="img"
              alt="Contemplative Reptile"
              height="140"
              image={yoda}
              title="Contemplative Reptile"
            />
            <CardContent>
              <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="h2">
                Lizard
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="textSecondary" component="p">
                Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000 species, ranging
                across all continents except Antarctica
              </Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </CardActionArea>
          <CardActions>
            <Button size="small" color="primary">
              Share
            </Button>
            <Button size="small" color="primary">
              Learn More
            </Button>
          </CardActions>
        </Card>
      </ButtonBase>

      <MovieInformation
        open={openMovieInformation}
        onClose={() => setOpenMovieInformation(false)}
        movie={props.movie}
      ></MovieInformation>
    </>
  );
}
